module.name: rpm
module.summary: Policy for the RPM package manager.

interface.name: rpm_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute rpm programs in the rpm domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_domtrans_script
interface.summary: Execute rpm_script programs in the rpm_script domain.

interface.name: rpm_run
interface.summary: Execute RPM programs in the RPM domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the RPM domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the RPM domain to use.

interface.name: rpm_exec
interface.summary: Execute the rpm client in the caller domain.

interface.name: rpm_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from RPM.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_read_pipes
interface.summary: Read from an unnamed RPM pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write an unnamed RPM pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from rpm over dbus.

interface.name: rpm_manage_log
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the RPM log.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_use_script_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from RPM scripts.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_manage_script_tmp_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete RPM script temporary files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_manage_db
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the RPM package database.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpm_dontaudit_manage_db
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete the RPM package database.
